def: a long trip or process of personal growth
the state of continuing to live despite hardship
firmness of purpose; resolve
a feeling of expectation and desire for a positive outcome
events that will happen to a person in the future
something that tests strength or ability
the accomplishment of an aim or purpose
lack of success in achieving something
the ability to face danger or pain without fear
a difficult effort to achieve something
to accept as true or real
to fill someone with the urge to do something
a cherished aspiration or ideal
a close and trusting relationship between people
to save someone from a dangerous situation
the act of giving up something for a greater purpose
faithfulness or devotion to someone or something
continued effort despite difficulties
finding something previously unknown
the quality of being thankful
